tasks.label: Preview Resume (HTML, pdf.css)
args: set -a; [ -f .env ] && source .env; set +a; uv run scripts/dev_preview.py --port 8765 --markdown README.md --css styles/pdf.css
tasks.detail: Serve README.md as HTML with styles/pdf.css and update on refresh.

tasks.label: Generate PDF (WeasyPrint)
args: set -a; [ -f .env ] && source .env; set +a; uv run scripts/md_to_pdf.py README.md --css styles/pdf.css
tasks.detail: Convert README.md to README.pdf using WeasyPrint with styles/pdf.css.
